core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix SaaS precision with Lifestyle warmth.
Emotion First: The app should feel 'creative' and 'energetic', not bureaucratic.
Content is King: The script text is the hero. Typography must be impeccable.
Negative Space: Use generous padding (p-8+) to let the content breathe.
anti_patterns: No dense, spreadsheet-like tables without breathing room.

buttons.primary: bg-[#FF7870] hover:bg-[#E66A63] text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold shadow-lg shadow-pink-200 transition-all hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-full px-6 py-3 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-500 hover:text-[#FF7870] hover:bg-pink-50 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-colors

inputs.base: rounded-xl border-slate-200 bg-white px-4 py-3 text-sm focus:border-[#FF7870] focus:ring-4 focus:ring-pink-100 transition-all outline-none placeholder:text-slate-400

cards.base: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-slate-100 shadow-xl shadow-slate-200/50 p-6 md:p-8 hover:shadow-2xl hover:shadow-slate-200/60 transition-all duration-300

stepper.container: flex items-center justify-between w-full max-w-3xl mx-auto mb-12

tables.container: w-full overflow-hidden rounded-xl border border-slate-200 bg-white shadow-sm
tables.header: bg-slate-50 border-b border-slate-100 text-xs font-bold text-slate-500 uppercase tracking-wider

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Ensure 'Manrope' font is imported in index.css from Google Fonts.
2. UI POLISH: Use the 'cards.base' style for all main content containers. Do not use raw divs.
3. STEPPER: Implement a custom Stepper component that sits at the top of the Wizard. It must strictly follow the active/completed states defined in 'colors'.
4. TABLES: For the Scripts Selection step, use a table layout. Ensure the 'Notes' column has a text input (Shadcn Input or Textarea) that feels integrated.
5. TABS: Use a custom Tab component (pill shaped) for switching between Hook categories. Do not use the default browser tabs look.
6. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all text on the light pink background has sufficient contrast (use Slate-900 for main text).
7. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, tabs, checkboxes).
8. MOCK DATA: Use the provided image URLs for the 'Visual Style' step. Create a dummy list of scripts for the 'Script Selection' step.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Do not center align the app container.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, focus, active).
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
